validation.tags_data is None: The list of tags to process was not received.
validation.not isinstance(tags_list, list): The list of tags received seems to in an unexpected structure.
validation.len(tags_list) < 2: The list of tags received contains less than two tags.

except.sqlite3.IntegrityError: It seems that one of the tags you are trying to toggle on was already set for this image. Each tag should be assigned to an image only once.
